translations: vi.<俚>闲聊；拍马屁，扯关系；亲密交谈（schmooze 的过去式和过去分词）
vt.<俚>与……闲聊（schmooze 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Don and I regularly5 schmoozed over the counter about movies, our families, our dogs, and philosophies of life.
sentences.translation: 唐和我常隔着柜台闲聊，聊聊电影、家人、我们的狗狗，还有人生哲学。

sentences.sentence: The City was schmoozed assiduously, new fiscal rules were announced, colleagues who made uncosted spending pledges were not so much scolded as scalded.
sentences.translation: 整个伦敦城名声斐然，新财经政策得以宣布，恳请削减开支的同僚们也未遭受流言蜚语的沉重打击。
